REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2794 reute u f BC-ARCO-<ARC>-SAYS-NET-T 03-31 0045

TEXT.TITLE: ARCO <ARC> SAYS NET TO COVER DIVIDEND PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Atlantic Richfield Oil Co said it expects first quarter net income to cover its dividend requirements in the quarter. The company paid a quarterly dividend of one dlr a share earlier this month. Reuter
